name: A Forest And A Little Red Square
name_original: A Forest And A Little Red Square
description:
A tiny puzzle game with tricky controls. Light up the Sun!

Made for Trijam #83 in four hours, the theme was: Trees

Everything hand drawn! (And I think I'll keep with that style, I like it ; ) I only must admit that most of it was drawn by my 15 years old brother.

I created the game in Godot - and it was the first time I was using Godot : }  So I didn't have time to make something bigger while I was trying to figure out how the engine actually works :D

The only third party asset was the background - it was drawn by my younger brother a few months ago.

Controls

Only left and right arrow keys!

(And Esc to restart)
